rev.comment: Unprotected Armenian Genocide: It has been a few weeks; time to unprotect
/* Casualties */ {{translate}} removed, apparently in English, no listing at [[WP:PNT]]
Robot - moving categories per [[WP:CFD]] at [[Wikipedia:Categories for deletion/Log/2006 May 11]].
/* Art */ Uncontroversial MoS edit -- Removing extraneous linking and special quotes. Fixed spelling, grammer, italics.
Protected Armenian Genocide: Users engaging in edit warring. [edit=sysop:move=sysop]
/* World War I */ smartquotes -> double quotes, indents -> blockquote
/* Support */ tag blockquote for quote rather than identing
rm "unencyclopedic tone" tag (pov tag can stay), unencyclopedic section already tagged for translate
